name: 03 - Create a channel
precondition: A team should already have been created and users must be added to the team.

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description: Run `./mattermost channel create --team ateam --name mynewchannel --display_name "My New Channel"`
inline.expectedResult:
1. Output in CLI should look similar to:
    `Id: z5iknrxz97nstn6h7dukhqi6gw
    Name: mynewchannel
    Display Name: My New Channel`
  2. Admin viewing the new team clicks "More..." under Public Channels and sees "My New Channel" (Don't joint it!)

inline.description: Run `./mattermost channel create --team ateam --name mynewprivatechannel --display_name "My New Private Channel" --private`
inline.expectedResult:
Output in CLI should look similar to:
`Id: 8yx9xgne8pdf5xm5ooij43fckw
Name: mynewprivatechannel
Display Name: My New Private Channel`
(Private channel will be verified in following test, when admin user is added to it)
